discovery_rule.name: Informix Instances
discovery_rule.description:
APPLICATION-MIB::applName
Show each instance found into the server.

item_prototype.name: Application {#SNMPVALUE} - Informix Version
item_prototype.description:
APPLICATION-MIB::applVersion.893002000
"The version of network service application software."

item_prototype.name: Application {#SNMPVALUE} - Instance Name
item_prototype.description:
APPLICATION-MIB::applName.893002000
"The name the network service application chooses to be known by."

item_prototype.name: Application {#SNMPVALUE} - Status (SNMP App)
item_prototype.description:
APPLICATION-MIB::applOperStatus.893002000
"Indicates the operational status of the network service application. 'down' indicates that the network service is not available. 'running' indicates that the network service is operational and available. 'halted' indicates that the service is operational but not available. 'congested' indicates that the service is operational but no additional inbound associations can be accomodated. 'restarting' indicates that the service is currently unavailable but is in the process of restarting and will be available soon."
up(1), down(2), halted(3), congested(4), restarting(5)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Chunk Writes
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerChunkWrites.893002000
"The number of chunk writes."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Deadlocks
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerDeadLocks.893002000
"The number of deadlocks detected so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Disk out of space
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoDiskOutOfSpaces
"The total number of times the server has been unable to obtain disk space that it wanted, since server startup. This would be inspected by an agent on receipt of an rdbmsOutOfSpace trap."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Disk reads
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoDiskReads
"The total number of reads of database files issued to the operating system by this server since startup. Numbers are not comparable between products. What constitutes a read and how it is accounted is product-specific."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Disk Sorts
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerDiskSorts.893002000
"The number of sorts that required disk space."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Disk writes
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoDiskWrites
"The total number of writes to database files issued to the operating system by this server since startup. Numbers are not comparable between products."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Foreground Writes
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerForegroundWrites.893002000
"The number of foreground writes."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Isam Calls
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerIsamCalls.893002000
"The total number of ISAM-level operations (reads, writes, rewrites, deletes, commits, and rollbacks) executed so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Latchs Waits
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerLatchWaits.893002000
"The total number of times any thread waited for a latch."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Lock Requests
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerLockRequests.893002000
"The number of lock requests handled so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Lock timeout
item_prototype.description: Informix-MIB::onServerLockTimeouts.893002000

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Lock Waits
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerLockWaits.893002000
"The number of times any transaction waited for a lock."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Logical log records
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerLogicalLogRecords.893002000
"The number of records written to the logical log so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Logical Logs used
item_prototype.description:
# of Logical Logs used (based on uniqueid flow, onstat -l)
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Logical Logs without backup
item_prototype.description:
# of Logical Logs without backup
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Logical log writes
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerLogicalLogWrites.893002000
"The number of logical log writes so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Logical reads
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoLogicalReads
The total number of logical reads of database files made internally by this server since startup. The values of this object and those of rdbmsSrvInfoDiskReads reveal the effect of caching on read operation. Numbers are not comparable between products, and may only be meaningful when aggregatend across all servers sharing a common cache."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Logical writes
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoLogicalWrites
"The total number of times parts of the database files have been marked 'dirty' and in need of writing to the disk. This value and rdbmsSrvInfoDiskWrites give some indication of the effect of 'write-behind' strategies in reducing the number of disk writes compared to database operations. Because the writes may be done by servers other than those marking the parts of the database files dirty, these values may only be meaningful when aggregated across all servers sharing a common cache. Numbers are not comparable between products."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Log page writes
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerLogicalLogPageWrites.893002000
"The number of pages written to the logical log so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # LRU writes
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerLRUWrites.893002000
"The number of LRU writes."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Memory Sorts
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerMemorySorts.893002000
"The total number of sorts that are done in memory."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Network reads
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerNetworkReads.893002000
"The number of network reads so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Network writes
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerNetworkWrites.893002000
"The number of network writes so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Page reads
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoPageReads
"The total number of pages in database files read by this server since startup. 'Pages' are product specific units of disk i/o operations. This value, along with rdbmsSrvInfoDiskReads, reveals the effect of any grouping read-ahead that may be used to enhance performance of some queries, such as scans."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Page writes
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoPageWrites
"The total number of pages in database files written by this server since startup. Pages are product-specific units of disk I/O. This value, with rdbmsSrvInfoDiskWrites, shows the effect of write strategies that collapse logical writes of contiguous pages into single calls to the operating system."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # PDQ Calls
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerPDQCalls.893002000
"An instantaneous measure of current parallel query activity, to be used as a general measure of decision support activity."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Read ahead index+data pages
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerReadAheadPages.893002000
"The number of read-aheads for index and data pages."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Read ahead pages used
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerReadAheadPagesUsed.893002000
"The number of read-ahead pages used."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Request receives (inserts)
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoRequestRecvs
The number of receive operations made processing any requests on inbound associations. The meaning of operations is product specific, and is not comparable between products.
This is intended to capture lower-level i/o operations than shown by HandledRequests, between clients and servers, or between peers. For instance, it might roughly correspond to the amount of data given with an 'insert' statement. It is not intended to capture disk i/o described in rdbmsSrvInfoDiskReads and rdbmsSrvInfoDiskWrites."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Requests (Select/Insert)
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoHandledRequests
The total number of requests made to the server on inbound associations. The meaning of 'requests' is product specific, and is not comparable between products.
This is intended to encapsulate high level semantic operations between clients and servers, or between peers. For instance, one request might correspond to a 'select' or an 'insert' statement. It is not intended to capture disk i/o described in rdbmsSrvInfoDiskReads and rdbmsSrvInfoDiskWrites."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Request sends(rows)
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoRequestSends
"The number of send operations made processing requests handled on inbound associations. The meaning of operations is product specific, and is not comparable between products.
This is intended to capture lower-level i/o operations than shown by HandledRequests, between between clients and servers, or between peers. It might roughly correspond to the number of rows returned by a 'select' statement. It is not intended to capture disk i/o described in DiskReads."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # RSS Backlog
item_prototype.description:
# of RSS backlog ( ~ delay ) in pages (logical log)
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # RSS Connections active
item_prototype.description:
# of RSS connections active
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # RSS Servers
item_prototype.description:
# of RSS servers configured
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Sequential Scans
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerSequentialScans.893002000
"The number of times a sequential scan is performed."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Sessions
item_prototype.description: # of User Sessions. Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Sessions Active
item_prototype.description: # of Active Sessions. Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Sessions in lock waits
item_prototype.description:
# of User Sessions waiting for lock.
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Sessions in waits
item_prototype.description:
# of User Sessions waiting for something what isn't lock or yield process.
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Sessions top
item_prototype.description:
Max # of Active Sessions since the database was started.
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Threads
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerThreads.893002000
"The current number of threads."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Threads Ready
item_prototype.description: # of Threads Ready (onstat -g rea) to run into CPU Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Transactions commits
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerTransactionCommits.893002000
"Number of transactions committed by the server."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # Transactions rollbacks
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerTransactionRollBacks.893002000
"Number of transactions rollbacked by the server."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - # VPs
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerVPs.893002000
"The current number of virtual processors."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - % Logical Logs without backup
item_prototype.description:
% of Logical Logs without backup (calculed from the # of active logs, onstat -l output)
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Buffer flushes
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerBufferFlushes.893002000
"The number of times the buffers are flushed to disk so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Buffer Waits
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerBufferWaits.893002000
"The number of buffer waits."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Checkpoint in Progress
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerCheckpointInProgress.893002000
"The value of yes if a checkpoint is underway."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Checkpoints
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerCheckpoints.893002000
"The number of checkpoints taken so far."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Checkpoints Waits
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerCheckpointWaits.893002000
"The number of checkpoint waits."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - CPU System Time
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerCPUSystemTime.893002000
"CPU SystemTime usage (in centi-secs)."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - CPU User Time
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerCPUUserTime.893002000
"CPU UserTime usage (in centi-secs)."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Highwater Inbound Associations
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoHighwaterInboundAssociations
"The greatest number of inbound associations that have been simultaneously open to this server since startup."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Max sort disk space
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerMaxSortSpace.893002000
"The maximum disk space used by a sort, in pages."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Memory - Messages segment
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerMessageMemory.893002000
"The current size of the message buffer memory, in kilobytes."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Memory - Resident segment
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerResidentMemory.893002000
"The current size of the resident memory, in kilobytes."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Memory - Virtual segment
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerVirtualMemory.893002000
"The current size of the virtual memory, in kilobytes."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Physical Log pages used
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onPhysicalLogPagesUsed
"The number of pages used in the physical logfile."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Physical Log Size
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onPhysicalLogPagesAllocated
"The number of disk pages assigned to the physical logfile."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Startup time
item_prototype.description:
RDBMS-MIB::rdbmsSrvInfoStartupTime.893002000
"The date and time at which this server was last started."
OBSERVATION: For some reason, The zabbix appear not able to interpret the format of data.

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Status (SNMP Server Mode)
item_prototype.description:
Observation: This status stop to be collected when the engine goes offline!!!! (I don't know why!)
Informix-MIB::onServerMode.893002000
"The current operating mode of the server."
initializing(1), quiescent(2), fastRecovery(3), backingUp(4), shuttingDown(5), online(6), aborting(7), onlineReadOnly(8), microKernel(9)

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Status (zabifx)
item_prototype.description:
Informix database status , based at onstat return :
onstat - ; $? # 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Time since last checkpoint
item_prototype.description:
Informix-MIB::onServerTimeSinceLastCheckpoint.893002000
"Time (in centi-secs) since the last checkpoint occured."

item_prototype.name: Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Uptime
item_prototype.description:
Time the instance is UP. Based on "onstat -" header output
Executed by Zabbix Agent + UserParameter + zabifx script

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - 30% Logical Log without backup
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger the alarm if the number of logical logs without backup reach 30% of available logs.

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - 50% Logical Log without backup
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger the alarm if the number of logical logs without backup reach 50% of available logs.

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - 70% Logical Log without backup
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger the alarm if the number of logical logs without backup reach 70% of available logs.

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - 90% Logical Log without backup
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger the alarm if the number of logical logs without backup reach 90% of available logs.

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Disk out of space
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger a warning when occur any disk out of space (filled some dbspace)

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Down! (snmp)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 6 (online) , database isn't available to users.
initializing (1) quiescent (2) fastRecovery (3) backingUp (4) shuttingDown (5) online (6) aborting (7) onlineReadOnly (8)

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Down! (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - RSS connection
trigger_prototype.description: trigger the alarm if exists any RSS server configured and the last two checks there is no connection;

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - RSS sync
trigger_prototype.description: trigger the alarm if exists any RSS server configured and the last three backlog capture is growing (~ secondary isn't applying the log for some reason)

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Sessions in lock
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger alarm if occur to any session be was locked on the last three capture consecutive... (= 6 minutes)

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Sessions in lock
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger alarm if occur to any session be was locked on the last five capture consecutive... (= 10 minutes)

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Sessions in wait
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger alarm if occur to any session be in wait (not locking) on the last five capture consecutive... (= 10 minutes)

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - SNMP MONITOR DOWN!
trigger_prototype.description: Active trigger if no data collected last 15 minutes from SNMP service

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Unavailable
trigger_prototype.description: Trigger created only to be used into "IT Services" SLA control.

trigger_prototype.name: trg - Informix DB {#SNMPVALUE} - Unavailable (zabifx)
trigger_prototype.description:
Status differ 5 (online) , database isn't available to users.
# 0 Initialization mode # 1 Quiescent mode # 2 Recovery mode # 3 Backup mode # 4 Shutdown mode # 5 Online mode # 6 Abort mode # 7 User mode # 255 Off-Line mode
